text: Nunton () is a settlement on Benbecula in the Outer Hebrides, Scotland. Nunton is within the parish of South Uist, and is situated on the B892. ==References== ==External links== *Canmore - South Uist, Benbecula, Nunton Steading site record *Canmore - Benbecula, Nunton, Ruin of St Mary's Chapel site record *Canmore - Benbecula, Nunton, 'The Mermaid's Grave' site record *Canmore - Benbecula, Dun Torcusay site record Category:Villages in the Outer Hebrides Category:Benbecula
title: Nunton, Benbecula
